spiritsExplanation:
The workout is classified primarily as 'Structured & Disciplined' with a score of 0.75 due to the focus on a full-body strength routine using precise intervals (30-second intervals) and specific repetition goals (8-12 reps). The exercise list (squats, rows, lunges, etc.) indicates a methodical approach to covering major muscle groups in a disciplined manner as reflected in both the title and description.

In addition, the 'Soothing & Restorative' spirit is also applicable, with a score of 0.7. This is inferred from the inclusive language in the description and tags targeting seniors and beginners, emphasizing a welcoming, gentle atmosphere. Comments like "Your gentle and kind attitude kept me going" and testimonials from older adults highlight the restorative, encouraging elements that support mental and emotional well-being.

Other spirits like 'High-Energy & Intense' or 'Flow & Rhythm' are less applicable as the focus is on strength, not high-intensity cardio or coordinated dance movements.
